node.title: I wake up my computer from power-save mode by...
node.author: sacked

data.field: Moving the mouse around wildly Moving the mouse around in a controlled manner Accidentally bumping my desk, which in turn moves my mouse around wildly Clicking one of the mouse buttons Pounding the keyboard Pressing the shift key Pressing the spacebar Pressing another key which I believe will not affect any open programs or windows Pressing any key, not caring if it affects any open programs or windows
